text: Hernandia stokesii is a species of plant in the Hernandiaceae family. It is found in French Polynesia and the Pitcairn Islands. ==References== * Waldren, S. 1998. Hernandia stokesii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. title: Hernandia stokesii
